name: Easy Spinach Souffle
author: Jennifer
summary: This is a tasty and quick side dish--ready in just minutes.  Note, this is a 'lite' souffle--for a more traditional souffle, double the sauce ingredients.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl whisk together egg, milk, cheese, garlic, salt and pepper
Place in a small casserole dish
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly set
NOTE:  If you are in a hurry, use a microwave safe casserole dish, cover with plastic wrap, and cook on high for 3 minutes
Release the steam, recover, and cook on high for another 3 minutes
